roleset.name: to observe, see, or be a site of
roleset.note: WITNESS-V NOTES: Member of Vncls captain-29.8-1, sight-30.2. (from witness.01-v)

example.name: transitive
example.text: In other words , after some highly visible dithering and public airing of differences , the administration has come down on the side of those who believe that [what]-3 we are witnessing [*T*-3]from Berlin to Siberia is a good thing to be welcomed , rather than a new thing to be feared or viewed with suspicion .

example.name: non-agentive subject
example.text: The junk market has witnessed some trouble
